alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 09 at 3:33AM EDT until April 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...HIGH FIRE WEATHER DANGER THIS AFTERNOON... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT TODAY FROM 12 NOON TO 8 PM THIS EVENING FOR THE COMBINATION OF GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY GROUND CONDITIONS... The National Weather Service in Melbourne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM this evening. This replaces the Fire Weather Watch which is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Orange, Seminole, Osceola, Okeechobee, Brevard,Indian River, Saint Lucie, and Martin Counties. * WIND...West around 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum values of 30 to 35 percent. * IMPACTS...Dry fuels will increase the threat for the ignition of new fire. Any fires that develop will spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is strongly discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
